humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there were two sentinel lymph nodes assessed and both were negative for tumor (0/2). Based on the rules provided, this corresponds to an N0 stage, which indicates no metastatic carcinoma in regional lymph nodes. This is consistent with the pathologic diagnosis of intraductal and infiltrating ductal carcinoma in the left breast, with no evidence of lymph node metastases.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that two sentinel lymph nodes were examined and both were negative for tumor (0/1, 0/1). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
